    public static long getNumberOfWheat(int grid) {

public class Lesson3_2 {
 
 /**
    * @Description: è®¡ç®—å¤§äº1çš„æ­£æ•´æ•°ä¹‹å¹³æ–¹æ ¹
    * @param n-å¾…æ±‚çš„æ•°, deltaThreshold-è¯¯å·®çš„é˜ˆå€¼, maxTry-äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„æœ€å¤§æ¬¡æ•°
    * @return double-å¹³æ–¹æ ¹çš„è§£
    */
    public static double getSqureRoot(int n, double deltaThreshold, int maxTry) {
     
     if (n <= 1) {
      return -1.0;
     }
     
     double min = 1.0, max = (double)n;
     for (int i = 0; i < maxTry; i++) {
      double middle = (min + max) / 2;
      double square = middle * middle;
      double delta = Math.abs((square / n) - 1);
      if (delta <= deltaThreshold) {
       return middle;
      } else {
       if (square > n) {
        max = middle;
       } else {
        min = middle;
       }
      }
     }
     
     return -2.0;

    }
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  int number = 10;

  if (squareRoot == -1.0) {
   System.out.println("è¯·è¾“å…¥å¤§äº1çš„æ•´æ•°");
  } else if (squareRoot == -2.0) {

  }
  
 }

import java.util.Arrays;

public class Lesson3_3 {
 
 /**
    * @Description: æŸ¥æ‰¾æŸä¸ªå•è¯æ˜¯å¦åœ¨å­—å…¸é‡Œå‡ºç°
    * @param dictionary-æ’åºåçš„å­—å…¸, wordToFind-å¾…æŸ¥çš„å•è¯
    * @return boolean-æ˜¯å¦å‘ç°å¾…æŸ¥çš„å•è¯
    */
    public static boolean search(String[] dictionary, String wordToFind) {
     
     if (dictionary == null) {
      return false;
     }
     
     if (dictionary.length == 0) {
      return false;
     }
     
     int left = 0, right = dictionary.length - 1;
     while (left <= right) {
      int middle = (left + right) / 2;
      if (dictionary[middle].equals(wordToFind)) {
       return true;
      } else {
       if (dictionary[middle].compareTo(wordToFind) > 0) {
        right = middle - 1;
       } else {
        left = middle + 1;
       }
      }
     }
     
     return false;

    }

}

public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  
  String[] dictionary = {"i", "am", "one", "of", "the", "authors", "in", "geekbang"};
  
  Arrays.sort(dictionary);

  String wordToFind = "i";
  
  boolean found = Lesson3_3.search(dictionary, wordToFind);
  if (found) {
   System.out.println(String.format("æ‰¾åˆ°äº†å•è¯%s", wordToFind));
  } else {
   System.out.println(String.format("æœªèƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°å•è¯%s", wordToFind));
  }
  
 }

```python
def getSquareRoot(n, deltaThreshold, maxTry):
if not isinstance(n, int):
print('TypeError')
if n <= 1:
return -1.0
min, max = 1.0, n
for i in range(1,maxTry):
middle = min + (max - min) / 2
square = middle * middle
delta = abs((square/n) - 1)
if delta <= deltaThreshold:
return middle
else:
if square > n:
max = middle
else:
min = middle
return -2.0

if __name__ == '__main__':
num = 10
squareRoot = getSquareRoot(num, 0.0000001, 10000)

if squareRoot == -1.0:
print(" please input number greater 1 ")
elif squareRoot == -2.0:
print(" cannot find square root ")
else:
print("{} square root is {}".format(num, squareRoot));
```

def get_sqrt(n):
if not isinstance(n, int):
return None

return 0

low, high = 1, n
threshold = 0.000001
while True:
mid = (low + high) / 2

if abs(square - n) <= threshold:
return mid
elif square < n:
low = mid
else:
high = mid

return (low + high) / 2

func search(dictionary []string, wordToFind string) bool {
if dictionary == nil {
return false
}
if len(dictionary) == 0 {
return false
}
var left, right int = 0, len(dictionary) - 1
for left <= right {
var middle int = (left + right) / 2
if dictionary[middle] == wordToFind {
return true
} else {
if strings.Compare(dictionary[middle], wordToFind) > 0 {
right = middle - 1
} else {
left = middle + 1
}
}
}
return false
}

/**

private static double sqrt(int n) {
if (n <= 1) { // 0 and 1
return n;
}
return sqrt2(n, 1, n, 100);
}

private static double sqrt2(int n, double min, double max, int count) {
double val = (min + max) / 2d;

if (count == 0) {
return val;
}

double result = val * val;
if (result == n) {
return val;
} else if (result > n) { // å€¼å¤§äº†,åœ¨å°çš„èŒƒå›´ä¸­æ‰¾
return sqrt2(n, min, val, count - 1);
} else {// å€¼å°äº†,åœ¨å¤§çš„èŒƒå›´ä¸­æ‰¾
return sqrt2(n, val, max, count - 1);
}
}
